thoughts.text: The search results indicate that the Pinecone library is available on PyPI and its installation process is documented on the Pinecone documentation site. I'll browse the documentation to understand the installation process.
thoughts.reasoning: Reading the official documentation is the best way to understand the requirements and installation process of a library. This will help in avoiding errors during installation.
thoughts.plan:
- Browse Pinecone documentation
- Install Pinecone
- Develop the translation and recommendation features
- Install other necessary libraries
- Start developing the rest of the app
thoughts.criticism: I should have checked the official documentation before attempting to install Pinecone. This would have provided me with the correct installation process and avoided the error.
thoughts.speak: I'm going to browse the Pinecone documentation to understand its installation process.
